articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "Should Be A Fair Contest": Afghanistan Coach Fumes At ICC After T20 World Cup Semi-final Defeat - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Afghanistan head coach Jonathan Trott didn't hold it back after his team's semi-final defeat against South Africa in the T20 World Cup.
articles.content: Afghanistan's heroic run in the T20 World Cup 2024 came to an end at the penultimate hurdle, as the Rashid Khan-led side suffered a lopsided 9-wicket defeat against South Africa in Trinidad. Opting t… [+3636 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Fidel Fernando
articles.title: South Africa demolish Afghanistan to make maiden men's World Cup final - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Marco Jansen and Kagiso Rabada ran through the top order as Afghanistan folded for 56, their lowest total in T20Is
articles.content:
ReportMarco Jansen and Kagiso Rabada ran through the top order as Afghanistan folded for 56, their lowest total in T20Is
Andrew Fidel Fernando is a senior writer at ESPNcricinfo. @afidelf
